author: rbb
msg: We don't actually use anything in atime.h, so get rid of it, and include
all of the headers in the .c files.

author: trawick
msg: Change the mmap() feature test to check only for existence.
The autoconf-provided check used previously fails when the
platform doesn't support MAP_FIXED.  Apache doesn't use that
mmap() feature, so we don't want to require it.

author: rbb
msg: Add the resource limiting code back to Apache 2.0.  This only works on
Unix because I can't find any other platforms with rlimit.  If there are
other platforms that need this code, then some of the code needs to move.
This has just barely been tested, so it could probably use some good

author: trawick
msg: Fix problems introduced as part of the "Convert ap_proc_t to a complete
type." change.  It is in rarely-compiled code, so probably noone noticed
(Now if I could figure out why I'm erroneously getting into that code, I'd

author: trawick
msg: Fix bad call to ap_pcalloc() in ap_dso_load(); the bug led to a storage
overlay as not enough storage was allocated for the ap_dso_handle_t.
